üèÜ PHOTO COMPETITION D3.RU ‚ñ™Ô∏è TOP10 OCTOBER TOP10 ‚ñ™Ô∏è October 2019 ‚ñ™Ô∏è Top 10 D3 voting papers published in the FOTO.d3.ru copyright photo community. üê• Winners receive Gold Accounts for a year 01 Nov 2019, 04:04 by raw ü•á 1st place
Pal ‚Äì Secam
Full Moonrise in Murino ü•à 2nd place
Yaroslav Mishin
Autumn pattern ü•â 3rd place
Sergey Zubov
Teenage Girl diser
Gergeti < / a> Alexey Domrachev
Ring
Alexey Trofimov

King of the Woods Evgeny Lutsk
Happy Halloween Sergey Zakharov
Mermaids are waiting for victims,
Their light brown hair weaved on the net Dmitry Shamin
Night turns Competition rules: ‚ñ™Ô∏è The selection is made according to the calculation of the '+' votes of d3.ru participants who voted for the photos on the 1st of the next month. ‚ñ™Ô∏è In the event that photos claiming TOP10 are published in the last two days of the month, the vote count, by decision of the jury, may be delayed for one day. ‚ñ™Ô∏è The month of publication is determined by the time zone of the author. The end of the month in the Chicago time zone (CDT / CST, UTC ‚Äì 0500/0600) ‚ñ™Ô∏è d3 + rating reflects audience sympathy, but conditionally. ‚ñ™Ô∏è The number + is solely for comparison inside foto.d3, in other communities - other subscribers, viewers and the weight of votes. A 3-5 vote weight means that the voter has successfully posted his own photographs. ‚ñ™Ô∏è All published works are allowed to the competition, but only one work with the highest rating from each author takes part in the final selection. If a photo is deleted, it is replaced by the next rated one. ‚ñ™Ô∏è In case of a tie, ahead of the photo with the highest number of voters. ‚ñ™Ô∏è The name of the author is revealed depending on his desire. ‚ñ™Ô∏è Due to the fact that photos sometimes gain a high + rating due to an accompanying story, interesting facts, etc., moderators can distinguish such works from the general vote in separate nominations. ‚ñ™Ô∏è Photo contest winners, including a special nomination, will be awarded with Gold Accounts for one year and diplomas. üìù Every month, the best witty, interesting, or technical commentary can be selected, if any. The winner receives a Gold Account for three months. More details here. + pluses on FOTO.d3 are difficult to earn, they can not be compared with ++ in other forums. üñºÔ∏è BEST PHOTOS scored 100+ 150+ 200 + üèÜ PHOTOS of our authors won and selected in various competitions, etc. contest inbox
